registerUser.confirmOffer:

visitLabel.checkOutChooseTitle: Hi there, are you checking out already?

userUpdateRemind:
If you are changing your phone number
or email address, we need to
verify it again for security purposes.

filter.title: Filters
filter.disableSlider: Your change has not been activated. Please enable the location permission.

setUp.title: Setup Payment Method
setUp.description:
Hey! You want to start using Deskimo today?
Simply setup a payment method and
you are good to go!

quota.title: Business Payment Method
quota.description:
You have run out of credit
on your business account for this month.
Please select a credit card to pay
or request more monthly credit from your company.

checkInModal.description:
Place the QR Code in front of the scanner
to check in.

checkOutModal.description:
Place the QR code in front of the scanner
to check out and pay.

paymentRemind.title: Please complete payment
paymentRemind.description:
Please complete payment below
to continue using Deskimo

checkoutRemindModal.title:
Don’t forget to check out
to avoid overcharge
checkoutRemindModal.description:
When leaving the space, make sure you
have checked out. Otherwise, 
your visit will continue to be billed.

reEnterModal.description:
Place the QR code in front of
the scanner to re-enter

payment.deletePaymentDescription: Are you sure want to delete this payment method?
payment.deleteOngoing: Can't remove payment while there is an ongoing visit
payment.paymentEmpty: You have not added any payment method.
payment.outOfQuota: You have run out of credit on your business account for this month. Please select a credit card to pay or request more monthly credit from your company.

visitDetail.dailyRateInfo: Pay by the minute and stay as long as you want. You’ll never pay more than the Daily Rate.

propertyDetail.amenityDescription:
Special amenities are available for an additional fee.
Please approach the Community team at the front desk to purchase.
propertyDetail.checkinLabel: You are currently checked in at:
propertyDetail.workspaceUsageDescription: Are you still working? you’re nearly at the day rate - you might as well stay longer.
propertyDetail.messageShareFirst_1: Deskimo is changing the way I work. You mean I can work from
propertyDetail.messageShareSecond_1: Just found an amazing #hybridwork space on Deskimo. Check it out at
propertyDetail.messageShareThird_1: Check out this amazing workspace I found on Deskimo

any spaces in the area.

Try adjusting your filters, change your city,

visit.descriptionEmpty: You haven't checked in to any spaces yet.

errorMessage.normal: Oops, small error. Please try again.
errorMessage.invalidOtp: This code is invalid. Please try again.
errorMessage.emailIsExisted: A user has already registered with this email address.
errorMessage.phoneIsExisted: A user has already registered with this phone number.
errorMessage.addPaymentFail: Payment unsuccessful. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.addPaymentDecline: The card was declined. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.addPaymentInsufficient: The card has insufficient funds. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.addPaymentLost: The card is reported lost. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.addPaymentStolen: The card is reported stolen. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.addPaymentExpired: The card has expired. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.addPaymentError: An error occurred while processing the card. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.addPaymentIncorrect: The card number is incorrect. Please check your card information and try again.
errorMessage.rePayFail: Payment unsuccessful. Please check your card and try again, or contact support@deskimo.com
errorMessage.reSendReceiptFail: An error occurred. Please try again, or contact support@deskimo.com
errorMessage.inviteCodeInvalid: That invitation code didn't work. Please double check and try again, or contact support@deskimo.com
errorMessage.voucherInvalid: This voucher was not recognized. Please try again.
errorMessage.voucherUnavailable: This voucher is no longer valid.
errorMessage.voucherFirstCheckin: This voucher is available to first-time check-ins only.
errorMessage.voucherBusiness: This voucher is available for enterprise users only.
errorMessage.voucherCurrentBusiness: This voucher is not valid for your company.
errorMessage.voucherStack: This voucher cannot be applied together with your other voucher.
errorMessage.voucherLimit: This voucher has no remaining value.
errorMessage.voucherMarket: This voucher is not valid in your region.
errorMessage.voucherProperty: This voucher is not valid at this workspace.
errorMessage.voucherCurrencyInvalid: The voucher currency code is invalid
errorMessage.voucherWorkdesk: The voucher is valid only for Workdesk
errorMessage.voucherAccount: This voucher is not valid. Please try again.
errorMessage.noInternet: No internet connection. Please try again.
errorMessage.timeoutConnection: Connection timed out. Please try again.
errorMessage.expiredToken: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errorMessage.contactAdmin: An error occurred. Contact admin@deskimo.com for support.
errorMessage.paymentMarket: This payment is not valid in your current region.
errorMessage.meetingClose: In that time frame, this meeting room will be closed.
errorMessage.meetingBooked: You've already booked the exact same time for your meeting.
errorMessage.paymentNotAccept:
This payment is not accepted here.
Please try another payment.
errorMessage.businessCreditCardMiss: Please input credit card for your company
errorMessage.businessCreditCardInvalid: The credit card of your company is invalid. Please check the card information and try again.
errorMessage.deskNotAvailableThisTime: This desk is not available at this time
errorMessage.roomNotAvailableThisTime: This room is not available at this time
errorMessage.roomNotFound: The meeting room was not found
errorMessage.areaFull: This area is full. Try A different area
errorMessage.floorFull: This floor is full. Try A different floor
errorMessage.officeFull: This office is full. Try A different office
errorMessage.officeCheckInNotAvailable: This booking cannot check in this time
errorMessage.deskNotAvailableThisBooking: You can’t check in yet, Please check in on the same day of the booking
errorMessage.meetingRoomCannotFound: The meeting room cannot be found
errorMessage.meetingRoomCloseThatDay: The property will be closed on that day!
errorMessage.meetingRoomCloseThatHour: The property will be closed on that hour!
errorMessage.meetingRoomStartEndTimeInvalid: The start and end time are invalid!

start.title: Discover
start.description:
Choose from dozens of
professional workspaces to use

checkIn.title: Check In
checkIn.description:
When you arrive at the workspace,
tap "Check in" and scan your QR
code at the Deskimo scanner to
start your visit

checkOut.title: Check Out
checkOut.description:
Before you leave, tap
"Check Out" and scan the QR code
to exit the premises. You'll be billed
per minute of usage on Deskimo

meetingRoom.timeDescription: Add 15 mins buffer before and after the meeting.
meetingRoom.requirement1: • You must book 24 hours in advance.
meetingRoom.policy1: • Cannot be cancelled up to 1 hour before booking.
meetingRoom.policy2: • Meeting rooms can only be cancelled up to 1 hour prior to start time.
meetingRoom.policy3: • Once cancelled, your reservation will be removed.
meetingRoom.textBoxGrayPart1: You can enter the meeting room at
meetingRoom.textBoxGrayPart2: and you are expected to leave no later than

any meeting room in the area.

Try adjusting your filters or change your city
meetingRoom.bookingSubmitTitle: Thank you for booking with us.
meetingRoom.bookingSubmitDescription: Your booking has been successfully submitted. Workspaces normally confirm reservations within 60 mins during working hours. We will notify you via email and in the app once your reservation has been confirmed.

recurrence.confirmStopRecurrence: Are you sure want to stop this recurrence booking?
